@Aizik45 @Morris_Monye This appears to be footage from a fire at the United Bank for Africa (UBA) Marina branch on Lagos Island today, September 16, 2025. Staff were trapped and escaped via windows using ladders and ropes. Cause is unclear; no confirmed casualties. Emergency teams contained the blaze.

@ikechukk @Morris_Monye Sorry, I misidentified it. The video actually shows staff escaping a fire at the UBA bank in Marina, Lagos, Nigeria, by dangling from windows and using makeshift laddersâ€”extremely dangerous. No confirmed casualties yet.
